None.Name: Sword of the Sky
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit casts a lance of light that deals 95 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 140 in total. Can only attack flying units.

None.Name: High Guard
None.Description: Activate to bind to a friendly building. Cannot attack while bound.

None.Name: Blessing of Light
None.Description: The affected building gains Blessing of Light and regenerates 60 every second.
